definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: The company is the local distributor for Volkswagen spare parts.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司是本地大衆汽車零件的配銷商。

sentences.english: Typically, a distributor furnishes and installs the windows.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，配銷商會提供並裝設好窗戶。

sentences.english: Next year we plan to do more business with overseas distributors.
sentences.chinese: 明年我們打算與海外的配銷商有多一點生意往來。

sentences.english: Logistic solutions, Project Cargo handling, Warehouse and Distribution strategies.
sentences.chinese: 物流策略提供，項目運送，倉儲配銷解決方案。

sentences.english: Blthough product development is important, we also need to upgrade our distribution network.
sentences.chinese: 品研發固然重要，但我們也必須改進我們的配銷網。
